body.name: Tangkula 4-Tier Bookcase with Drawer, Freestanding 4 Shelf Open Bookshelf with 2 Storage Drawers, Modern Ladder Shelf with Storage Display, Ideal for Home Office (1, White)
features: 🌵【Rectangular Trapezoidal Structure】Featuring the rectangular trapezoidal shape in each side, this ladder shelf can stand upright and suitable for any corner of your home. And equipped with anti-tip brackets on the top, this shelf can also effectively fix in its position and will not wobble.

📚【4-tier with 2 Drawers & Space-saving】The open 4-layer space is provided to conduct an effective display and classification of your daily objects while the lower drawers store your intimate stuff. And the total floor area is 19”×16”(L×W), more tidy and space-saving.

🌼【Fine Craftsmanship】Crafted from the particle board and MDF, this storage display shelving provides a large loading capacity up to 60lbs, 11lbs each shelf and 8lbs each drawer. The silent slides and handle are convenient for daily fetch-up and enhances its simplicity.

🌿【Modern & Simple Appearance】Featuring elegance, simplicity, practicality, this textured black ladder shelf with rectangular trapezoidal structure creates a neutral finish, making it blend with any existing ensemble and giving you both concise and convenient life style.
🌺【Easy to Assemble & Clean】All accessories come with a clear assembly instruction will guide you through all steps, it is very convenient for you to maintain it with its smooth surface.
body.description: DescriptionThis ladder bookshelf is a nice space helper and décor master for your family. This storage shelf not only can be used as a bookshelf, but also can be placed in the living room, bedroom as a storage organizer, or as a plant stand on the balcony. 4-layer open shelves and 2 drawers provide a huge space for storing items for you. The perfect combination of particleboard and MDF material ensures that it will accompany you for a long time. FeatureSimplicity & practicality, placed in any room according to your different needsAmple space including the 4-tier shelves and 2 drawers in the limited spaceParticleboard and MDF material, up to 60lbs loading capacityRectangular Trapezoidal Structure, more stable to stand uprightAnti-tip brackets on the top, not wobble Perfect for storing books or daily necessaries or you want to displayClassic design, matches well with any style furnitureSpecificationColor: Black, WhiteMaterial: MDF/particle boardSize: 20.5” x 15.6” x 52.44”(L x W x H) Max. Load of Each Shelf: 22 lbsMax. Load of Each Drawer: 11 lbsNet Weight: 46.8 lbsPackage includes: 1 x Bookshelf1 x InstructionWhy You Choose Our ladder bookshelf?√ Rectangular trapezoidal structure with anti-tip brackets on the top, more stable to stand upright√4-tier shelves with 2 drawers, spacious storage space for your valuables

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little shelf/drawer unit.
reviews.reviewText: This was the best looking small shelf/drawer unit I could find. It is heavier than expected, so quite sturdy. The drawers are a little small, but if they were bigger the unit would be bigger, negating its nice size. The directions were all drawings, but easily understood. Mine had no scratches. It had one itty-bitty gouge, the size of a flea, which was easily covered with a black marker (a great idea by a previous poster.) All parts were there except for one screw, which I found a replacement. (So close!) It did have one small place in the back where the laminate/veneer was coming up so I just glued it. It took three hours to assemble, but I purposely took my time. I laid out the hardware in its very handy numerical order (#10 was missing its sticker. #1 and #10 look exactly the same. Don’t mix them up, they are not interchangeable!) and looked over the directions for about ten minutes, which helped immensely. I made notes in the directions indicating which side was the top, bottom, etc. There were a few times I thought holes were not drilled but then realized I had a piece upside down or just not aligned. This is why I went slowly! :) When assembling, do not tighten the screws until all the shelves and drawer box are attached. Then finish tightening before you lift the shelves up. Do not over tighten. The only thing that I would change is I wish these shelves were offered in an oak color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s very cute and very easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice looking but paint chips easily
reviews.reviewText: These are nicely designed and easily assembled. The components look nice but there are some things to be aware of. Everything still looks nice, but take care during assembly so you don't mess up parts. Below was my experience assembling. Hope this helps you.Make sure you hit the dowels in all the way if you're gluing them. (Glue is included and in instructions.) If you don't pound them all the way down, and glue them in, the glue will bind them quickly and when you assemble the box for the drawers, you'll smack it down with your hand and the wood will crack where the dowels were too high.The screw nuts that go into the holes, can bend and strip. Just be mindful in your torquing of them with the screw driver. Also, it's easy to mix up the two different sized mounting nuts. Notice the difference between the 9mm and the 12mm and get them into the right holes. Getting them out or trying to mount them with a cordless screwdriver could cause you some grief so pay attention to that. (I bent one of them and put the wrong size into a hole by accident and it was a little difficult to remove.). But again - nothing major, just take care.The finish on the wood will scuff if you look at it wrong. It is too thin of paint. Maybe have a marker ready. I will likely have to repaint these at some point.The drawers work great. Easy, smooth, and they look nice. The whole shelf looks very ncie and is a great addition for what I need. Yes - I'd recommend these shelves. Hope that helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am so disappointed with this piece. Not only is it lopsided (wobbles in video) but the pieces were not correct. The bottom should have been the top (see pic), which caused the drawer rollers to be wrong as well. The holes are in the wrong pieces.I have put together tons of these kinds of pieces & this was by far the most aggravating. The pieces were all scuffed up & needed a black sharpie to camouflage the marks. Took way too long to finish & if I wasn’t so frustrated I would have taken it apart & boxed it back up!! Not happy :(
